name: Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 ReMIX
description:
Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 ReMIX is an action-RPG game developed by Square Enix. It was originally released in 2014. Square Enix published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Kingdom Hearts HD 2.5 ReMIX on PlayStation 3.
Rie Nishi produced the game. It was directed by Tai Yasue and Tetsuya Nomura. Yoko Shimomura scored the game.
